text: I haven't seems like a bug. did it stop mid line? or was there any reason at all it may have stopped, like multiple empty lines?
I thought so too, especially since I've tested it on the template before and after modifying the default content, there's no logical explanation why it won't copy.
Can you try putting something above the first line and seeing if it copies that? if so can you also try putting something on the very next line right after the bottom?
